logs:
- Initial version  
- Added Android and iOS changelogs

- Bugfixes  
- UI improvements  
- add iOS 8.x-9.x changelogs

- Add WearOS changelogs  
- Added iOS 12-16 changelogs  
- Added Android 13 changelogs  
- Bugfixes

- Redesign UI  
- Move to universal model for versions  
    - Use Markdown in changelogs text
    - Dynamic values for any information
    - Support for headers and items in lists (powered by RecyclerView)  
- Make app runned by JSON (which means, you can add/edit information without changing app code)  
- Add caching for images and files  
- Add separate light/dark images for projects

- Bugfixes:
    - Show date in details
    - Fix snackbar position
 - Add dynamic titles on scrolling
 - Change repository url
 - Add Android 14 pre-support
